Title: Cosmic Sex
Writer: Liaquat Ali, Amitabh Chakraborty, Surojit Sen
Actors: Rii Sen, Ayushman Mitra, Biplab Banerjee, Papia Ghoshal
Plot: One night, Kripa is on the run from sex and violence when he meets Sadhavi, a woman who strangely resembles his dead mother. She gives him shelter and teaches him to travel inwards through sex.
